guild.name: {{ guild.servername | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
guild.description: {{ guild.description | xml_escape | strip_html | truncate:60 | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
guild.long_description: {% if guild.long_description %}{{ guild.long_description | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}{% else %}{% endif %}
guild.url_safe: {{ guild.servername | xml_escape | downcase | replace:' ', '' | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
guild.verified: {% if guild.verified %}{{ guild.verified | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}{% else %}false{% endif %}
